name: space-invaders
description: fixed shooter in which the player moves a laser cannon horizontally across the bottom of the screen and fires at aliens overhead

scripts.em-build-debug: em++ src/main.cpp -g -o dist/index.js -s USE_SDL=2 -s MIN_WEBGL_VERSION=2 -s MAX_WEBGL_VERSION=2
scripts.em-build: em++ src/main.cpp -o dist/index.js -O3 -s USE_SDL=2 -s MIN_WEBGL_VERSION=2 -s MAX_WEBGL_VERSION=2
scripts.build: npm run copy-static && npm run em-build
scripts.build-debug: npm run copy-static && npm run em-build-debug
